item.title: Metal: Hellsinger developer The Outsiders shuts down
item.content:encoded:
Studio affected by recent layoffs at Funcom.

Metal: Hellsinger developer The Outsiders will close its doors following recent layoffs at parent company Funcom, studio founder and creative director David Goldfarb announced in a Bluesky post.

Here is the message from Goldfarb in full:

Friends,

I have not had much time to process the news but all of us at The Outsiders and Funcom Stockholm have been affected by the layoffs at Funcom and our 10 year-old studio will be closing. Many of us had survived a near-death studio experience years back when Darkborn was cancelled, and because of this team‚Äôs loyalty and refusal to quit, Metal: Hellsinger was born. It will always be a high point for me personally and I will be forever grateful we got to make it and for the wonderful team and partnerships that made it happen.

We had hoped to do something even better this time‚Äî.

‚Äîthings don‚Äôt always go the way you hope.

But we are not giving up, and we are going to try to continue on in some new form. If you think you can help in any way, with business leads, placement for employees, guidance, whatever it is, I would be genuinely grateful if you reach out here. Change is always tough and right now we are all hurting.

Thanks so much.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/metal-hellsinger-developer-the-outsiders-shuts-down

item.title: Narrative adventure game A Pizza Delivery launches November 7 for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

A surreal and introspective journey.

Narrative adventure game A Pizza Delivery will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on November 7, publisher Dolores Entertainment and developer Eric Osuna announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Dolores Entertainment:

About

Embark on a surreal and introspective journey with ‚ÄúB,‚Äù a pizza delivery rider on her final order of the day. Ride through a dreamlike world filled with strange landscapes, unexpected shifts in scenery, and moments of quiet contemplation. This isn‚Äôt just a city‚Äîit‚Äôs a liminal space, a shared mental realm where individuals grapple with unease and longing.

Accompanied by her trusty scooter, B must navigate this enigmatic world, encountering eccentric characters and uncovering their deepest desires and regrets. Share a slice of pizza with them, and perhaps you‚Äôll find a piece of yourself within them.

Key Features

  • Meditative Exploration ‚Äì Journey through a captivating world, from bustling cityscapes to surreal landscapes.
  • A Narrative Experience ‚Äì Uncover the stories of the world and its inhabitants through environmental storytelling and character interactions.
  • Charming Characters ‚Äì Meet a cast of unique individuals and learn about their dreams, regrets, and aspirations.
  • Solve Puzzles ‚Äì Use your wits and intuition to overcome obstacles and deliver that final pizza.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/narrative-adventure-game-a-pizza-delivery-launches-november-7-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc

item.title: 2XKO ‚ÄòTies That Bind‚Äô cinematic trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Featuring singer Courtney LaPlante of heavy metal band Spiritbox.

Riot Games has released a new cinematic trailer for League of Legends-based free-to-play tag fighting game 2XKO dubbed ‚ÄúTies That Bind‚Äù and featuring singer Courtney LaPlante of heavy metal band Spiritbox.

2XKO is due out in Early Access for PC on October 7, followed by a full release across PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC.

Watch the trailer below.

Official Cinematic: ‚ÄúTies That Bind‚Äù featuring Courtney LaPlante of Spiritbox



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/2xko-ties-that-bind-cinematic-trailer

item.title: Pre-apocalyptic side-scrolling action adventure game GNAW announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
Redstart Interactive has announced GNAW, a pre-apocalyptic Metroidvania / side-scrolling action adventure game coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC, Mac, and Linux via Steam in 2026. A demo is available now for PC.

‚ÄúGNAW combines strong and dynamic combat encounters reminiscent of classic ‚Äô90s mainstays with a lore-rich world full of societal unrest,‚Äù said Redstart Interactive‚Äôs Jon Lawitts in a press release. ‚ÄúThis deinonychus will traverse seven different regions, each with its own distinct landscapes and platforming challenges, while fending off feral critters and vengeful scientific experiments.‚Äù

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Something‚Äôs rotten in New Dino City, and it‚Äôs up to you to solve the mystery in GNAW. In this Metroidvania, explore a pre-apocalyptic saurian civilization hurtling toward self-annihilation. Meet strange characters, fight off twisted critters, and rescue your beloved city from extinction.

Meet Mack Ripley! He‚Äôs Got Short Arms, a Big Heart, and Dreams of Being Something‚Ä¶ More

New Dino City is the heart of saurian civilization; a bustling metropolis filled with dinosaurs large and small. Creatures of all species live together in peace‚Ä¶ or they did until something began upsetting the natural order. Now, thrown into a strange situation filled with weird science and even stranger events, it‚Äôs up to Mack Ripley to unravel the mystery and save the world from extinction.

Not Your Average ‚ÄòSaur Anymore

Mack Ripley was just a guy living his life, wishing he could be something special. Thanks to a freak encounter of the science kind, Mack has been transformed. If you‚Äôve never seen a dinosaur with otherworldly powers, get ready to be amazed as Mack chomps, spits, and devours his foes.

Strange Powers: You Can Gnaw Your Own Way

With each new skill, you‚Äôll be able to unlock new ways to customize your playstyle. Whether you prefer to get up close and personal with those nasty critters, hang back and deal with them at a distance, or mix it up, you can make Mack your very own.

New Dino City: Enjoy the Bright Lights and Dangerous Underbelly

New Dino City has as many stories as it does dinos. Meet strange allies, twisted villains, and altered creatures as you uncover a diabolical mystery. How are all of the strange happenings connected? That‚Äôs for you to discover, but move quickly or else it may be lights out for the big city.

It‚Äôs Not Parkour, It‚Äôs ParkSaur: Getting Around New Dino City

Tall buildings, dark alleys, and some water that looks a little‚Ä¶ off. New Dino City has it all!

Traverse a world of densely interconnected skyscrapers, darkened alleys, and strange locales as you dive deeper into the weird happenings in the City. But be careful, there are threats around every corner just waiting to be discovered.

Myth or Fact? New Dino City has Alligators in the Sewers

What‚Äôs caused the peaceful critters of New Dino City to begin terrorizing the population? You‚Äôll need to use all of Mack‚Äôs abilities, create clever combinations, and push yourself to the limit to overcome challenging foes and terrifying bosses.

Key Features

  • A prehistoric Metroidvania 200 million years in the making.
  • An arsenal of 16 combat and traversal abilities.
  • Weave your way through dozens of regions as new abilities open new areas.
  • Look more than 150 snarling creatures right in the eye‚Ä¶ then beat them up.
  • Meet interesting denizens of New Dino City. And Gus. He‚Äôs‚Ä¶ you‚Äôll see.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/pre-apocalyptic-side-scrolling-action-adventure-game-gnaw-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-switch-and-pc
